title: Inception
plotSummary: A thief uses experimental dream-sharing tech to plant an idea in a target’s mind.

title: The Dark Knight
plotSummary: Batman faces the Joker as Gotham descends into chaos.

title: Interstellar
plotSummary: Explorers travel through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

title: The Matrix
plotSummary: A hacker discovers reality is a simulated prison controlled by machines.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plotSummary: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and freedom through acts of decency.

title: The Godfather
plotSummary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
plotSummary: Interwoven stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles’ underworld.

title: Titanic
plotSummary: A rich girl and a poor artist fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: Avatar
plotSummary: A paraplegic Marine is sent to Pandora and torn between duty and protecting a new world.

title: Fight Club
plotSummary: An insomniac and a soap maker form an underground fight club that spirals out of control.

title: The Social Network
plotSummary: The founding of Facebook sparks friendships, betrayals, and lawsuits.

title: Gladiator
plotSummary: A betrayed Roman general seeks vengeance as a gladiator.

title: Jurassic Park
plotSummary: Dinosaurs are brought back to life at a theme park with deadly consequences.

title: The Lion King
plotSummary: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father.

title: Toy Story
plotSummary: A cowboy doll feels threatened when a new spaceman action figure arrives.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plotSummary: A squad ventures behind enemy lines to bring a soldier home.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plotSummary: An FBI trainee seeks help from a brilliant cannibal to catch a killer.

title: Forrest Gump
plotSummary: A simple man’s extraordinary life intersects with historic moments.

title: The Departed
plotSummary: An undercover cop and a mole inside the police try to identify each other.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
plotSummary: A stockbroker’s rise and fall amid fraud and excess.

title: Whiplash
plotSummary: A young drummer strives for greatness under a ruthless instructor.

title: La La Land
plotSummary: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress chase dreams and love in LA.

title: Django Unchained
plotSummary: A freed slave teams up with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife.

title: The Prestige
plotSummary: Rival magicians obsess over creating the ultimate illusion.

title: The Avengers
plotSummary: Earth’s mightiest heroes assemble to stop an alien invasion.

plotSummary: Two revolutionaries forge a brotherhood and fight the British Raj in 1920s India.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
plotSummary: A young man learns of his royal heritage and sets out to rescue a captive queen.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
plotSummary: The epic saga continues as Mahendra uncovers why Amarendra Baahubali was betrayed.

title: Eega
plotSummary: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks revenge.

title: Mahanati
plotSummary: The rise and fall of legendary actress Savitri.

title: Arjun Reddy
plotSummary: A brilliant surgeon spirals after a heartbreak and struggles with anger and addiction.

title: Pushpa: The Rise
plotSummary: A coolie rises in the red sanders smuggling syndicate of Andhra Pradesh.

title: Jersey
plotSummary: A failed cricketer returns to the game in his 30s to fulfill his son's wish.

title: C/o Kancharapalem
plotSummary: Four love stories set in the small neighborhood of Kancharapalem.

title: Vikram
plotSummary: A black-ops agent hunts a violent drug syndicate.

plotSummary: An ex-convict must help the police fend off a gang while trying to meet his daughter.

title: Super Deluxe
plotSummary: Intersecting tales explore fate, morality, and love in Chennai.

title: Asuran
plotSummary: A farmer protects his family amid caste violence.

title: Soorarai Pottru
plotSummary: An underdog dreams of launching a low-cost airline.

plotSummary: A law student confronts caste discrimination and seeks dignity.

title: Master
plotSummary: A professor is sent to a juvenile school to reform students and faces a ruthless gangster.

title: Drishyam
plotSummary: A man goes to astonishing lengths to protect his family after a crime.

title: Kumbalangi Nights
plotSummary: Four brothers in a dysfunctional family find purpose and love.

title: Premam

title: Bangalore Days
plotSummary: Three cousins move to Bangalore to chase dreams and relationships.
People of Kerala come together during the devastating 2018 floods.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
plotSummary: A slum kid rises to power in the Kolar Gold Fields.

title: Kantara
plotSummary: A clash between villagers and authorities intertwines with folklore and ritual.

plotSummary: A wealthy former actor’s life in Cappadocia unravels amid class tensions and moral reckoning.
